data.title: Violant of Bar
data.meta_description: Violant of Bar was Queen of Aragon by marriage to John I of Aragon. She was active in matrimonial politics and served as regent of Aragon in the name of her spouse from 1388 until 1395.
data.text:
Queen consort of Aragon, Valencia, Majorca, and Sardinia and Corsica / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
